mapper.insert: insert into customerAddress(name, address, city, country, postCode, customerId) values(#{name}, #{address}, #{city}, #{country}, #{postCode}, #{customerId})
mapper.update: update customerAddress set name = #{name}, address = #{address}, city = #{city}, country = #{country}, postCode = #{postCode} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from customerAddress where customerId = #{customerId} limit #{page.numBegin}, #{pageSize}
